pkgmetadata.longdescription: Eflete, Edje Theme Editor - a theme graphical editor. EFL Edje Theme Editor is a rich graphical tool for Enlightenment Foundation Library (EFL) that provides UI for edc markup. It is aimed at simplifying the creation and editing of widget styles. In addition, this is a great example of a full-fledged practical use of the amazing functionality of the EFL.
